mapper.select: SELECT id,name,description,lat,lng,address,place_type, internal_original_url,internal_thumbnail_url, external_image_url,image_status FROM places WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id,name,description,lat,lng,address,place_type, internal_original_url,internal_thumbnail_url, external_image_url,image_status FROM places WHERE place_type = #{placeType} ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id,name,description,lat,lng,address,place_type, internal_original_url,internal_thumbnail_url, external_image_url,image_status FROM places ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id,name,description,lat,lng,address,place_type, internal_original_url,internal_thumbnail_url, external_image_url,image_status FROM places WHERE lat BETWEEN #{minLat} AND #{maxLat} AND lng BETWEEN #{minLng} AND #{maxLng} ORDER BY name ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO places ( name, description, lat, lng, address, place_type, internal_original_url, internal_thumbnail_url, external_image_url, image_status ) VALUES
(#{p.name}, #{p.description}, #{p.lat}, #{p.lng}, #{p.address}, #{p.placeType}, #{p.internalOriginalUrl}, #{p.internalThumbnailUrl}, #{p.externalImageUrl}, #{p.imageStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE places SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng}, address = #{address}, place_type = #{placeType}, internal_original_url = #{internalOriginalUrl}, internal_thumbnail_url = #{internalThumbnailUrl}, external_image_url = #{externalImageUrl}, image_status = #{imageStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
